Highlander Katanas

1 plugin = 2 swords | 5 versions:
Duncan McLeod's Katana: 2h long handle, 2h short handle, 1h
Connor McLeod's Katana: 2h, 1h


Installation:

Copy meshes + textures folder & HIGHLANDER KATANA.esp to your Skyrimdata directory.

The folder-structure should look like:
... SkyrimdatameshesweaponsHIGHLANDER ALL NIF FILES
... SkyrimdatatexturesweaponsHIGHLANDER ALL DDS FILES
... SkyrimdataHIGHLANDER KATANA.esp

Make sure that the plugin is activated in launcher => DATA FILES.
The weapon is placed in the forge-menu along with the steel items.

OR open console (key ^) and enter HELP HIGHLANDER 4
You get a code, after that enter PLAYER.ADDITEM CODE 1
(1 = amount) - the weapon will be placed in your inventory.

(Code should look like XX000D63, XX= the load number of the mod, for example PLAYER.ADDITEM 12000D63 1)

Damage should scale with your skills/lvl and is similar to the Daedric counterparts but faster,
if you want to adjust the dmg open the Creation Kit, LOAD, check SKYRIM.ESM and HIGHLANDER KATANA.ESP in
the left window, set HIGHLANDER KATANA.ESP to ACTIVE FILE and press OK. In the object window check ITEMS
and WEAPONS, search for HIGHLANDER | HIGHLANDER1H | HIGHLANDERSHORT or DUNCAN | DUNCAN1h and open the found form,
adjust the dmg/speed values in this window, press OK and SAVE. (see screenshots on TheNexus for further details)

greetings
Ghosu
